DOC.brief_summary: This study two main aim : 1 ) To determine ingestion solid beverage food form change appetite hormone response , 2 ) To determine whether `` learn '' ( define 2 week daily consumption ) metabolic consequence ingest solid beverage food form vary energy alters appetite hormone response . Beverage consumption implicate problem obesity . However , exact relationship beverage , low appetitive response lower compensatory dietary response remain unclear . This study aim address gap research . For aim 1 , null hypothesis energy beverage solid form affect appetite hormonal response differently . The alternative hypothesis exposure energy-yielding beverage elicit lower appetitive hormone response compare oral exposure solid food form . For aim 2 , null hypothesis learn change appetite hormone response . The alternative hypothesis learn decrease appetite hormone response non-energy-yielding beverage energy-yielding beverage .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Food Form Cephalic Phase Responses
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim study 3 phase . In phase 1 , unconditioned cephalic phase responses participant nutritive non-nutritive beverage solid food form determine . In phase 2 , participant consume randomly allocate solid food beverage ( either nutritive non-nutritive ) consecutively 2 week . In phase 3 , ( occur immediately end Phase 2 ) , participant retested cephalic phase response determine effect learn appetite hormone response .
